name: Jerry's endless travels Save Erick (vz200)
description:
After "Cursed skull" and "Alien planet underwater research" third vz port is "Jerry's endless travels Save Erick". In this game Jerry must save his friend from ghosts and other creatures on strange alien planet. The ending is different than on zx spectrum. 2 difficulty levels. 

Controls:

o-left,p-right,space-jump,q (on screens with big arrow) - teleport.
